name: Ruins of Majika
description:
Craft and strategically position defenses to safeguard your home against the perils of a hostile environment.
Prepare for the challenge as the world teems with wild beasts and formidable adversaries that emerge under the cover of night.
Are you ready to fortify your defenses and brave the untamed wilderness?

  • Gather vital resources, food & minerals. Embark on an exploration through diverse and unique biomes,
    unraveling their secrets as you navigate each distinct landscape



  • Build shelter, and craft items then upgrade your weapons, armor, and
    other equipment.



  • Battle your way through the lands and fight to survive.
    Some enemies drop rare resource materials that you will need to
    upgrade new towers, weapons, & armor.









  • Immerse yourself in the thrilling adventure of survival, honing your skills to protect your haven from relentless threats that lurk in the shadows.







  • Keep your defenses up and protect your territory.




  • If you're not yet strong enough to fight, there is always the option of running,
    but keep your stamina in check.
